description: A Brytescore API package schema to track real estate events

neighborhood.description:
Neighborhoods are geographic communities within a town, suburb, city or rural area. Generally considered more social than legal, neighborhood boundaries may not be agreed upon by its residents.
Neighborhoods are not the same as MLS-defined subdivisions, which are comprised of legally subdivided lots of land.

realEstateForm.description: A user-submitted data entry form with real estate fields

hidListing.description: Hid a listing from search results

listingImpressionBulk.description: Multiple Listing Impressions displayed in search results

playedListingVideo.description: The user played a video about a listing.

playedNeighborhoodVideo.description: The user played a video about a listing.

requestedInfo.title: requestedInfo
requestedInfo.description: Requested more information on a listing

viewedDriveTime.title: viewedDriveTime
viewedDriveTime.description: The user viewed the drive time from one address to another.

viewedNeighborhoodProfile.title: viewedNeighborhoodProfile
viewedNeighborhoodProfile.description: The user viewed a profile of a neighborhood.

viewedSchoolProfile.description: A user viewed the profile of a school.

viewedSubdivisionProfile.description: A user viewed the profile of a subdivision.
